participants.name: Heather Metcalf
participants.title: Director, Research and Analysis at Association for Women in Science

messages.message: How do I fix social issues with software? I am ready to go when you are!
There are lots of things that you can do as a software designer to address social issues!
So what would you rather have, food and water for poor people in Africa or gender equality? Assuming you can only choose one.
If there isn't gender equality or equity, which poor people in Africa do you think will get the food and water?
The ones with the ambition and strength to carry it and share it with their closest friends.
